item.title: Rafael Ruiz - MACALENA
item.description:
When I dance
they call me Macarena
And the boys they say
Que estoy buena
They all want me
They can’t have me
So they all come
And dance beside me
Move with me
Chant with me
And if you’re good
I’ll take you home
with me
Dale a tu cuerpo
alegria Macarena
Que tu cuerpo es pa
dare alegria
y cosas buenas
Dale a tu cuerpo
alegria Macarena
Ehh Macarena

y cosas buenas-

alegria Macarena
Ehh Macarena
Now don’t you worry
about my boy friend
The boy whose name is
victorino ha
I don’t wan’t him
couldn’t stand him
He was no good so I
Now come on
And it’s to friend
good so find
